title: Cedar Breaks National Monument: Park Fun
body: Park Fun                You don't need to be in a National Park or Monument to enjoy and learn about the outdoors. Below are various printable activities for kids age 5 to 105! Just click on the picture or title of the activity you want to do and a PDF document will open. Check back monthly for new activities!            Make a paper Pika!    Make a Paper Pika:  Print and assemble your own 3-D paper Pika! Just download and print on 8.5 x 11” paper in color, cut out and assemble!      This is an advanced activity for older kids.          Color a Pika!   Pika Coloring Page:    Print and color this cute Pika. Just download and print on 8.5 x 11” paper in black and white.   This is a great activity for all ages!         Color a Colorado Columbine!   Colorado Columbine Coloring Page: Download this coloring page of a Colorado Columbine. This flower usually blooms in a variety of pastel shades of blue, violet and white. It also has a rich aroma that attract a variety of birds, butterflies and bees. Just download and print on 8.5 x 11” paper in black and white.
